ygData.subject: Optimal configuration settings
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, this topic is restricted to those of us with modern computers. Just joking. When you right click on the file to run gladiator and then click on properties,

Subject: Optimal configuration settings
Message-ID: <9hrmjl+l8ql@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 854
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Ok, this topic is restricted to those of us with modern computers.  
Just joking.

When you right click on the file to run gladiator and then click on 
properties, what special modifications have you done to make the game 
run more smoothly?

I have changed the following Memory settings:
Intial Environment from Auto to 4096
Extended Memory from Auto to 4096

I have tried changing Extended Memory to higher values, but that 
always results in the game crashing.  I have also tried changing 
Conventional Memory but that results in the game crashing.  Changing 
MS-DOS protected mode memory has also resulted in the game crashing.

Are there any other modifications I can do to increase Gladiator's 
performance?  I have already closed down almost all my other programs 
when running gladiator.

BTW, after this topic, there are no new topics avaiable.
